summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI-Powered Mind interactive ebook with new features: 30-Day Challenge, Daily Model, Bookmarks, Progress Tracking, and Related Models. All backend APIs working perfectly (20/20 tests passed). Frontend functionality working well with minor UX observations.
passed_tests: All 20 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Landing page with hero, domains, daily model section, and 30-day challenge CTA
Navigation with all 6 links (Explore, 30-Day, Mind Map, Search, Saved, Journal)
/explore shows 6 domain cards with progress bars (0/40 read, 0%)
/domain/thinking-smarter loads model cards with bookmark icons
/model/thinking-smarter/1 shows detail with bookmark button, related models, and read status
Bookmark button toggle functionality works correctly
/bookmarks page shows bookmarked models after bookmarking
/challenge page shows setup view with 5-model selection and section filters
Challenge creation flow works (POST /api/challenge with 5 model IDs)
Active challenge page shows 30-day calendar, streak counter, daily models
/search page loads with search input and returns results
/journal page loads and allows creating entries
All backend APIs: sections, models, daily-model, stats, related models, challenge operations, journal CRUD
Progress tracking and bookmark persistence via localStorage
Related models display on model detail pages
30-day challenge calendar with proper day tracking
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (20/20 tests passed), Frontend: 95% (all major features working)
